subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Andy Dalton led Cincinnati from a 17-point deficit to a victory against the Seahawks, leaving the Bengals 5-0 for the first time since 1988, the last time they went to the Super Bowl.
snippet: Quarterback Andy Dalton led Cincinnati from a 17-point deficit to a victory against the Seahawks, leaving the Bengals 5-0 for the first time since 1988, the last time they went to the Super Bowl.
